website_summaries.verdict: A full-length set light enough for most climates, in stylish patterns you won't mind being seen in if you step outside.
pros: Lightweight set in a variety of colors and patterns
Pockets for your phone, keys and more
cons: May run large, check sizing carefully when ordering
Leg length better for petite women

customer_reviews.title: Not the quality that I would expect from Nautica
customer_reviews.text: I was hoping this was going to be an awesome review because I love these jammies. It isn't though, I have had these for less than two weeks and they already have a hole in the leg along the seam. This is not the quality that I would expect from Nautica Clothing.
customer_reviews.author: Caprice Wilson

customer_reviews.title: ... is my third pair of these pajamas - my favorite pjs of all time- soft
customer_reviews.text: This is my third pair of these pajamas - my favorite pjs of all time- soft, comfy, well made- you will thank me if you choose them,,
customer_reviews.author: anniera

customer_reviews.title: Inspect carefully before washing or wearing to be sure both pieces are the correct size.
customer_reviews.text: I really like the pajamas, and really really wanted to wear them. The top was a Medium as ordered and fit perfectly, but the bottoms shipped were TWO SIZES larger than ordered! Label said XL, fit was XL. Problem? I ordered Medium!
customer_reviews.author: Darby Rose

customer_reviews.title: I love these pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas! I wanted something warm for these cold nights and these were perfect. They washed and dried nicely. They do have a draw string like described but also have an elastic waist band which I like. I just ordered another pair!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So comfy - plus pockets!
customer_reviews.text: These PJ’s from Nautical are really nice. I’m a petite 6-8 in clothing and bought a Medium. I like my pajamas to be loose and comfortable, and these are great. I love the wide waistband which is so comfortable, and the pockets are a great plus. I’m thinking of looking for another pair of these.
customer_reviews.author: D. Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: My step-daughters liked these so much that they suggested we ALL get matching jammies for next Christmas. Should be fun.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not too thick and hot but warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Its fuzzy and warm but not too thick nor too hot. I think it'll work well. It shrunk a little even w/ cold wash and gentle heat on drier so beware. I went a size larger than usual as I loathe short jammy pants. It fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: AM and LD

customer_reviews.title: Sizing
customer_reviews.text: These are very nice pjs and seem well made. Very soft. I ordered 2 sizes larger and it’s good because the arms would not be big enough otherwise. I’ve not washed them in a washer yet but did in the hotel sink and they have a great deal of lint but probably this would be removed in the washer and dryer.
customer_reviews.author: Angel of the Springs

customer_reviews.title: Soft & Comfy.
customer_reviews.text: Super soft - super comfy! I typically wear a 6/8 in top & bottoms - the medium fit perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: jen

customer_reviews.title: Warm
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these pajamas for my elderly mother who is on blood thinners and always cold. She absolutely loves them. They are not only warm, but they are also extremely comfortable. As with most clothing by Nautica, these pajamas are very well made with quality workmanship and stitching. Along with the expected quality and comfort, they also look very nice. Due to her cold nature, my mother often wears the bottoms under her own pants, for an extra layer of warmth. As the winter draws closer, I will certainly purchase more of these for my mother, and I will probably purchase a few pairs for my daughters as well.
customer_reviews.author: DJ Paige

customer_reviews.title: Still not right.
customer_reviews.text: This pj was really cute and what was expecting from Nautica getting ready for winter by the sea time. I would have stayed with it except that the size again is wrong. Expecting this I asked for 1 X Large and the length of the pj barely made it to my wrist and ankles. One wash and you know what happens. Whatever sizes you order, order one if not two sizes bigger. I don't think Nautica is measuring with us American women in mind but petite diminutives versions.
customer_reviews.author: Pilar ugarte

customer_reviews.title: Soft and cozy
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite pajamas right now as they are super soft and are warm and inviting to wear ALL the time! They are a little big, but I did order a size up, normally a small, but I ordered a medium as I didn't want them to shrink when I washed/dried them. I like my pj's a little on the larger side anyways. This medium is a tiny bit larger than expected, but, like I said, it works for me. Don't let the size deter you from enjoying the softest pj's you will ever own!
customer_reviews.author: JL514

customer_reviews.title: These PJ's are wonderful. very warm and fit perfectly
customer_reviews.text: These PJ's are wonderful. very warm and fit perfectly. I will order another pair because these are great. Thank you for great service and prompt delivery.
customer_reviews.author: DebbyR

customer_reviews.title: Short
customer_reviews.text: As usual, the pajama pants were a tad bit short for my 5ft 6in frame, which is the problem I always seem to have with pjs. I’m going to keep them anyway, they’re pretty good quality, but I sure wish they were an inch or two longer. :(
customer_reviews.author: Dayofhearts

customer_reviews.title: Most comfy winter pjs ever!
customer_reviews.text: Comfy and cute. I bought my first pair last autumn. They became my favorite pjs. Since then I bought 3 more pair in different prints. Won’t wear for several months, but fully stocked. I’m 5’2”, 110 pounds and the Small fits well as the pants have a tie at the waist.
customer_reviews.author: LH

customer_reviews.title: Great pajamas 💗
customer_reviews.text: The best pajamas I have ever purchased! Very soft material, great fit and after being washed and dried they are like brand new. I will definitely be buying another pair in a different color. A great product and price from wonderful Amazon!
customer_reviews.author: Sunshine Sally

customer_reviews.title: These pj's are the best quality I have seen.
customer_reviews.text: Thisroduct is so good, I intend on buying another set. The material is so soft, warm, but light weight. I didn't want to take them off, because the set is so comfortable to wear. I highly recommend these pj's. You won't be sorry.
customer_reviews.author: P. J. Templeton

customer_reviews.title: Cute & comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I got the XL and it fit perfectly. I am 5'8 and wear a 12-14. The bottoms are high waisted just like I prefer.
customer_reviews.author: Lori Rice

customer_reviews.title: MY NEW FAVORITE JAMMIES
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable. I like the cuff on the sleeve. Good thing I'm going to keep them because the packaging was very complicated, with the top and bottom joined together, size tape all over, and complicated folding. It would have been a nightmare to rebag. Instead, they're in the laundry basket ready to wash and wear. They are 95% polyester and 5% spandex.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: My second pair!
customer_reviews.text: I was given a pair of these pajamas for Christmas and I liked them so much I bought another pair in a different color. I love the deep pockets - they are large enough to fit an iphone. I wear these pajama pants to physical therapy too because they are loose in the legs, and I am able to pull the pant legs over my knee in order to ice my knee. They are also very soft and have been holding up great after many cycles in the washer/ dryer. I will be buying more.
customer_reviews.author: Tahoe pow chaser

customer_reviews.title: Very cozy
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair of extra small for my daughter for Christmas. She liked them so much that I ordered a pair for me. These PJs are very soft, warm, and cozy. I ordered a small, and the crotch is slightly short which surprised me, but they are a great winter PJ, and they look good without having to wear a robe.
customer_reviews.author: Californian

customer_reviews.title: Not real fleece
customer_reviews.text: The material is ribbed brushed cotton, not real fleece. It's very thin and not warm, I ordered an XXL and received an XXXL The to top is big but bit the pants are too big. They drag on the floor and the leg width is almost 2 feet in circumference. I'd keep looking for a different brand.
customer_reviews.author: Rhonda Jersild

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: These are nice pajamas. The fabric is soft and fleecy but not too thick to be comfy for sleeping. Stretchy and roomy too. The stitching is good - others I’ve bought sprung holes within a few washings. Great quality! These will get me through another Montana winter.
customer_reviews.author: Janie Petaja

customer_reviews.title: Worse buy
customer_reviews.text: Way too large. Print was awful. Came with a funny scent. Wish I didn’t have to wear it when I opened it on my trip to CapeTown. Would have definitely returned it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect pajams
customer_reviews.text: These pajamas are simply THE BEST. I bought a pair at Costco, and by the time I tried them on and realized that I had discovered pajama nirvana, they were sold out at my warehouse. So I was thrilled to find these on Amazon. The fit is perfect (I am 5'5" and 105 in an XS) and the fabric is the softest I've ever felt. I wish Nautica would make a summer weight version of these.
customer_reviews.author: Jane

customer_reviews.title: Washed before wearing and bottom pants hem came apart. Elastic waist is not laying right.
customer_reviews.text: I bought the same pajamas only in a different print at Costco and liked them so much that I bought this 2nd pair on Amazon. However, this pair is missing the mark on quality. I washed them before wearing and the bottom pants hem came apart. Elastic waist is not laying right. This actually came from a discount store in southern California.
customer_reviews.author: Mouse1999

customer_reviews.title: Run true to size. Don’t order up a size
customer_reviews.text: The product looked like the picture. The item was received in reasonable time. Usual things are made anymore in China and run very small. I ordered up 2 sizes to be extra comfortable. They run exactly true to size for a change. I’ll probably give them to someone else.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Hauptfleisch

customer_reviews.title: Super Soft and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I had another pair like these from Nautica and ordered these because I liked the first pair so well. With this one, the top is slightly longer and that's good too! Very soft and comfy. Easy wash and dry, just dry low to keep them soft.
customer_reviews.author: Jean

customer_reviews.title: OBSESSED
customer_reviews.text: Was gifted a pair for Christmas and promptly purchased SIX MORE (not kidding). They’re warm and fuzzy, but silky. They fit flawlessly and drape nicely so you don’t look like a slob. If I could only wear one sleep/loungewear outfit for the rest of my life, this would be it—AND they launder like a dream (tap cold wash and tumble dry on low heat).
customer_reviews.author: maryamelia

customer_reviews.title: Runs a little on the small side but really really comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very cute, soft, warm, comfortable. Get a half or whole size larger than you would normally for optimum comfort.
customer_reviews.author: Whippoorwill

customer_reviews.title: x small! Perfect fit!
customer_reviews.text: Pajamas rarely come in an extra small. I happened upon a Costco display that had all an extra small in four patterns. I bought my favorite, and quickly regretted not buying all of them. Amazon to the rescue!
customer_reviews.author: June

customer_reviews.title: Love em!
customer_reviews.text: I got a pair of these for Christmas. Loved them so much, I ordered another pair. They are soooo soft and comfortable. Not to mention, the price is great. They wash well. I hang dry them and they don't get weird and crinkly and kinda crispy like some other clothes do when you hang dry. They dry really well. Highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Great Dane Mom

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: This is the perfect lounge wear set as they are soft and comfy. I wear a size 12 and ordered the Medium and fits perfectly - not too long, just right. This is a very high quality fabric and isn't too heavy but just the right weight of fabric to wear. I bought it at half price and am very satisfied with my purchase, dollar wise and clothing wise.
customer_reviews.author: Idaho gal

customer_reviews.title: 2 Sets for me, 1 For my mom!!!
customer_reviews.text: My first set was from Costco, love them!!! Ordered a second set because they are so soft and comfortable. My mom wore them when she spent the night and kept hinting to have her own. Ordered this set for her for Mother's Day. She was very excited to receive them!!!
customer_reviews.author: Sheri' Bryant

customer_reviews.title: Soft and lightweight
customer_reviews.text: The pajama set is beautiful, very soft. I put it away till winter. I’m a sz. 4 and I purchased a small. It fits very well now. I just hope it doesn’t shrink when washed.
customer_reviews.author: Bets

customer_reviews.title: Hated bottoms
customer_reviews.text: The top fits nice the bottoms run very big. Fit around waist ok, but legs are extremely big and I’m a thin person. I feel like they were design for Plus size
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Odendahl

customer_reviews.title: Defective !!!
customer_reviews.text: The drawstring to my pants are in the back of the pants. It's supposed to be in the front. I didn't discover this defect until after I washed them. I would like a new pair sent to me.
customer_reviews.author: Jenni Jones

customer_reviews.title: Best Sleepwear Ever!
customer_reviews.text: The quality of this product is great; the fleece is so soft and comfortable. I have washed them on delicate cycle and dried them on low with no noticeable shrinkage. The fleece is warm without being too heavy. Originally, I had gotten these pajamas as a Christmas gift and liked them so much that I had to purchase another pair.
customer_reviews.author: Linda L. Biederstedt

customer_reviews.title: Clothes To Cuddle Up Next To The Fire In
customer_reviews.text: Have you ever wanted to look like the pure embodiment of comfort? What about during the Winter Holidays? Look no further than this 2-Piece Fleece Pajama Sleepwear Set. Finally, clothing that can represent how you feel in on the inside -- warm & fuzzy! (Cinnamon scent not included.)
customer_reviews.author: Arlitto

customer_reviews.title: Came with a puffed out defected pocket
customer_reviews.text: This was a bit of a disappointment for the name brand. Usually they have nice clothes that are made well. Super thin (not warm for winter) yet they are supposed to be fleece pjs. I am disappointed but not bothering to send back.
customer_reviews.author: ReneeB

customer_reviews.title: The best PJ's
customer_reviews.text: These are now my favorite cold weather pajamas. They are very soft and comfy and nice looking. I love the cuffs that keep the sleeves from riding up. They do shed a little until washed several times. I hope they are available for next winter. I will buy another pair.
customer_reviews.author: musicnpiano

customer_reviews.title: Comfy
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love these. They feel really soft and comfy on the inside. No itchy seems, tags.
customer_reviews.author: T. Flores

customer_reviews.title: Very happy.
customer_reviews.text: My fave p.j.'s ever! It's getting warm now but I have purchased 5 different sets of these now as in the winter I kind of live in them. Soft and wash up perfectly, they also sell for a LOT more other places. Very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Jann

customer_reviews.title: As expected > PERFECT
customer_reviews.text: Everything as expected from this manufacturer. Wish they were a little bit roomier. Of course, maybe I should lose 10-15 pounds!
customer_reviews.author: J. Mathis

customer_reviews.title: Warm without being heavy
customer_reviews.text: These are my favorite PJ’s. I had an exact pair that I purchased at Costco about a year ago and to my dismay I left them behind in a hotel. Of course Costco no longer had them. I was devastated. I came across these and thought “well those look similar”, I’ll give them a try. SURPRISE they are the same!!!! I was beyond happy. Comfy, cozy and wash like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Chance salaz

customer_reviews.title: Soft and great fit!
customer_reviews.text: Bought as a gift for my mother. She is a small and they fit perfectly! She gets cold easily and loves wearing these because they keep her warm. I immediately bought another set in a different pattern and she loves them both! Very soft and washes well. Will get another set as a Christmas gift.
customer_reviews.author: Deborah Bruchwalski

customer_reviews.title: Pockets were ripped - returned .This could be a seller issue
customer_reviews.text: I would have kept these since I buy matching pjs for my girls and I every Christmas. Unfortunately 2 of 3 had ripped pockets so the quality was not there. Disappointing.
customer_reviews.author: LoveLea

customer_reviews.title: Really comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for a sorority social (pj party), and what I normally wear to sleep in isn’t presentable....anywhere. The material is soooo soft, I now find myself wearing this on chilly nights. I really love them!
customer_reviews.author: Lou

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly soft, but much larger than expected
customer_reviews.text: The softness is wonderful; very warm. However, the "small" felt more like a "large". Definitely get a size smaller or maybe even two sizes smaller.
customer_reviews.author: frequent shopper

customer_reviews.title: So Soft
customer_reviews.text: Very comfortable. Warm, but not too warm. Good for wearing in the winter or in the summer, especially if you have a cold a.c. that makes it kinda chilly. The material isn't heavy, and is very soft on the skin.
customer_reviews.author: DSKO1

customer_reviews.title: SO soft and comfy!
customer_reviews.text: The softest, most comfortable pajamas I’ve ever owned! I got a pair for Christmas and loved them so much I had to buy another pair before they were no longer available. I usually wear a medium in pajamas and the medium fit perfectly. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: doubledj

customer_reviews.title: Not warm and are flocked.
customer_reviews.text: I thought these were winter pajamas but found they’re almost see through as they’re basically flocked with areas that aren’t. They won’t last long and aren’t very warm.
customer_reviews.author: J. Overbeck

customer_reviews.title: Luxurious and comfy
customer_reviews.text: I purchased these for my grandma after my sister had given a pair to our mom for Christmas. They look & feel heavenly, wash nicely and are the most luxurious pjs I’ve seen. As my grandma is 85 years old and unable to leave her apartment on her own, she spends a lot of time in comfy clothes but still likes to look nice. She was extremely happy to receive these!
customer_reviews.author: dwright

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Nautica pajamas are the best! They are so comfortable and they wash and dry great. I received Nautica pajamas as a gift and had never had them before. I was so happy with them I recently ordered 4 more sets for me and my daughter from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: lisa r.

customer_reviews.title: warm and cozy
customer_reviews.text: Just as expected. I'm tall at 5'9". The pajama's arms and legs were plenty long. A lot of clothing is made for much shorter people.
customer_reviews.author: Penny

customer_reviews.title: Good
customer_reviews.text: Great! Only problem was that it had a hole by the seam for the pants. I did some basic sewing and it is now good! I like the feel of it so much that I got more in different colors.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria

customer_reviews.title: Snuggle soft
customer_reviews.text: So so soft! I love how it feels! Snuggles and comfortable
customer_reviews.author: happy grandmaw

customer_reviews.title: Fits smaller than other pairs of the same barns and style
customer_reviews.text: I bought a pair in size small, in the aqua color and they fit completelly different than this pair. This pair is much smaller in the waist and hip on the bottom, and in the waist of the top.
customer_reviews.author: Mars

customer_reviews.title: Soft Fabric
customer_reviews.text: The fabric is very soft but the fit of the pants could be better. Too short from the waist to crotch. Top fits OK. Will not buy that brand again.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great quality
customer_reviews.text: Love the quality and the price was reasonable as well
customer_reviews.author: B Z

customer_reviews.title: SOOOOOO SOOOOOFT
customer_reviews.text: These are the most amazing PJ's I ever bought. I can't explain how soft they are. They keep their softness after washing also. They are just as soft inside . Well made, fits perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Doreen Bequary

customer_reviews.title: So comfy!
customer_reviews.text: This is not my first pair of these pj's and they are wonderful. So soft and comfortable. Just love them.
customer_reviews.author: Kathleen E

customer_reviews.title: Very soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft and comfortable pjs. I enjoy wearing them to lounge around at night to watch TV.
customer_reviews.author: Darlene Maughan

customer_reviews.title: Material is a knit micro fleece and it has thin lines running through the material.
customer_reviews.text: They need a different material. I liked them but they didn't last. They come apart after a few washes.
customer_reviews.author: Lk

customer_reviews.title: Very generous sizing.
customer_reviews.text: I bought an XL I like my pjs roomy, But these are large for me, I had to be sure the waist was tied up. If I bought more I would buy one size down next time. They are good PJs for the price.
customer_reviews.author: concerned pet owner

customer_reviews.title: Buy a size up!
customer_reviews.text: Super cute and soft, but I can only wear the bottoms as the top is too small. I bought my normal size, but the top is really tight and unwearable for comfort. Should have returned, but I kept them because the pants fit.
customer_reviews.author: Amber700

customer_reviews.title: Very comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Very soft and comfortable. Washes up very well and holds its color and shape.
customer_reviews.author: Singing Bird Cottage

customer_reviews.title: Cute
customer_reviews.text: Great fir the money but needed to wish them a few twice before they were sift Cute on
customer_reviews.author: Kathy Murphy

customer_reviews.title: Cute and oooh so soft
customer_reviews.text: These are cute and very comfy. Mom always wore nightgowns but loves these.
customer_reviews.author: Breb

customer_reviews.title: Perfect sizing excellent
customer_reviews.text: Excellent soft just perfect sizing Comfortable Each one loved this gift of all ages
customer_reviews.author: Maria Schwerdtfeger

customer_reviews.title: Warm and comfy !
customer_reviews.text: Wife loved them ! Warm snuggly and not too hot. They fit perfect. Just order them so they fit a little loose like jammies are supposed to.
customer_reviews.author: Tim Sander

customer_reviews.title: The best pjs!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfortable. I bought them for my daughters too!
customer_reviews.author: kATHERINE mARTIN

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: I love these pjs. They are not just for sleeping! I love to come home from work and change into them! Super comfy!
customer_reviews.author: Caitlin Brainard

customer_reviews.title: Runs Small!
customer_reviews.text: I probably should have guessed that this brand would run small, but I ordered my usual size in pjs (L) and these are definitely a medium. Nice fabric, very soft.
customer_reviews.author: LynneArtist

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas they are so soft and just the right fabric weight. An added bonus, the pants have pockets
customer_reviews.author: Harry B Shinn

customer_reviews.title: I know Brogan will love these!
customer_reviews.text: A gift yet to be opened by my niece, but beautiful color and fabric
customer_reviews.author: Kathi

customer_reviews.title: Thin yet soft fabric
customer_reviews.text: These are very soft PJs. They would not be warm enough for very cold weather but perfect for a winter in the south.
customer_reviews.author: tracy a.

customer_reviews.title: Nautical 2 piece pajamas
customer_reviews.text: True to size and very comfy to wear! No shrinkage when washed!
customer_reviews.author: Linda

customer_reviews.title: This is super soft material!
customer_reviews.text: This is the most amazing material. It is so soft and comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: hotdish

customer_reviews.title: Love them!
customer_reviews.text: Super soft and comfortable. Fit great! Bought a second pair.
customer_reviews.author: TF

customer_reviews.title: I love it!
customer_reviews.text: I love my pijama, is soft and super confortable. It keeps me warm.
customer_reviews.author: Yelitza Duran

customer_reviews.title: Soft soft soft soft
customer_reviews.text: Completely awesome!! I bought these for my Mom who has other nautica pjs she loves. These blow the current ones out of the water!! Came back to order another pair and they're sold out.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not that great
customer_reviews.text: The material feels a little weird and the pants have a regular elastic waistband, which I didn't expect - not super comfortable.
customer_reviews.author: Marion

customer_reviews.title: Pajamas perfect for Alaska
customer_reviews.text: Comfy, warm and cozy for Alaska winters! I'll definitely buy more!
customer_reviews.author: Karen W

customer_reviews.title: Petite perfect
customer_reviews.text: I am a very small woman so it is difficult to find anything that fits. These are a perfect fit, comfortable and wash well.
customer_reviews.author: Sheila Larkin

customer_reviews.title: Cute and Comfortable
customer_reviews.text: Warm and soft. They fit well and are comfortable. Cute snowflake pattern
customer_reviews.author: LaWagn

customer_reviews.title: Takes too long
customer_reviews.text: If it had arrived sooner I would have given 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great PJs
customer_reviews.text: They are such a soft nice fleece, relativity thin fleece, so not the best for heart of winter, but so soft and yummy. I ordered a zize up which was a mistake. Might order another pair in Medium.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very nice PJs for any woman who likes to be comfy cozy.
customer_reviews.text: Girlfriend LOVES them !! Hi have since bought several more for her. Soft comfy warm but, no over heat issues
customer_reviews.author: My Honest Opinion

customer_reviews.title: So comfy
customer_reviews.text: I got these for my 90 yr old mom and she loved them. She says they are so warm and soft.
customer_reviews.author: Red

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable material
customer_reviews.text: Soft material. The size I ordered pants long. No problem.
customer_reviews.author: shelly

customer_reviews.title: Pampering ☆☆☆☆☆
customer_reviews.text: My new favorite pajama <3 ☆☆☆☆☆ fit true to size, color and description. It is very very soft and pampering. I highly recommend!!
customer_reviews.author: nina

customer_reviews.title: Super comfy!
customer_reviews.text: Love them! Super soft and comfy definitely s great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: karyn phillips

customer_reviews.title: Very nice
customer_reviews.text: These are very comfortable and they wash very well. I have two pair and I love them as does my daughter.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: The softest pj's ever
customer_reviews.text: I love these pajamas! They fit perfect and are so soft and comfortable! I am definitely ordering more, my new favorite!
customer_reviews.author: SavageGram

customer_reviews.title: Soft and comfy
customer_reviews.text: Love these PJs. Soft, long enough. Thinking of purchasing a second set
customer_reviews.author: janet jackson

customer_reviews.title: Love these pajamas
customer_reviews.text: So comfortable, fits well, has pockets. I'm hard to please when it comes to pajamas, but I love these!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable pajamas
customer_reviews.text: I love the pajamas! They are so comfortable however shipping was delayed.
customer_reviews.author: B C

customer_reviews.title: feeling great
customer_reviews.text: I Love this Item, very good Fit and feeling great and soft
customer_reviews.author: edigna morin

customer_reviews.title: SO SOFT! SO CUTE! SO IN LOVE WITH THESE PJ’S!
customer_reviews.text: Love love LOVE! Softest material ever! So cozy warm! Perfect for cold winter nights. I Love them!
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Guebert

product_meta.title: Nautica Women's 2 Piece Fleece Pajama Sleepwear Set
product_meta.description: Features: Colors: Red (Plaid), Light Blue (Dots), Dark Blue (Snowflakes), Gray (Fairisle) Textured stretch microfleece Button placket top with long sleeves Functional drawstring waistband Side pant pockets Wide leg Made in Cambodia Content: 95% Polyester | 5% Spandex Sizing: XS=2-4 | S=6-8 | M=10-12 | L=14-16 | XL=18-20 | XXL=22-24 Color & size subject to availability Care Instructions: Machine wash cold with like colors Gentle cycle Only non-chlorine bleach when needed Tumble dry low Remove promptly Low iron if needed
feature_bullets: Button placket top with long sleeves
Side pant pockets and wide pants leg
Machine wash cold with like colors, Gentle cycle
